attributes.action: Overnight Covid vaccinations for keyworkers inc early years, teaching, retail
attributes.additional_details: Downing Street officials claim there is no “clamour” from the British public for overnight Covid vaccinations, yet refuse to put certain frontline workers on the priority vaccination list. By allowing overnight vaccination for these workers it keeps daytime slots free for the elderly and vulnerable.
attributes.background: Allow the roll out of Covid vaccinations overnight for frontline workers inc Early Years and teaching staff, retail and essential services leaving daytime slots for the elderly and vulnerable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
